alert.note: Alert for Faulk (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:07PM MDT until May 09 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Faulk County in north central South Dakota... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Evergreen Colony, or 8 miles north of Faulkton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Evergreen Colony around 710 PM CDT. Cresbard around 720 PM CDT. Devoe around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Chelsea, South Scatterwood Lake and North Scatterwood Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
